text: Walter Jakob Gehring (March 20, 1939 – May 29, 2014) was a Swiss developmental biologist. He was a professor at the Biozentrum Basel of the University of Basel, Switzerland. He earned his Ph.D. at the University of Zurich in 1965. After two years as a research assistant of Professor Ernst Hadorn he joined Professor Alan Garen's group at Yale University in New Haven as a postdoctoral fellow. He was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 1989. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Swiss biologists Category:Scientists from Zürich Category:Academics of the University of Basel Category:Members of Academia Europaea
title: Walter Jakob Gehring
